message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $13500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to serve you with this high-quality product.
